column5: Trying to make some Beef Jerky, what marinade would be best? And any other helpful hints.
I have a few but they're nowhere near as good as Joey's. She'll chime in I'm sure.
Thanks guys, not sure why that thread doesn't show when I searched. Now to let it marinade overnight.
Joey's.  Better than Chloe's in Noelville, and that's saying something.
